item.title: Graduate Research Assistant
item.description: Generated over 100 hours of synchronized court case videos using Nvidia NeMo ASR and Sadtalker, enhancing legal tech accessibility by leveraging machine learning and natural language processing techniques to achieve 98% accuracy in alignment of audio-to-text transcription and real transcript.

item.title: Software Development Intern
item.description:
• Enhanced data security and reliability for storage systems by developing a custom data integrity verification tool.

• Optimized processing efficiency for large number of objects through implementation of optimized tree traversal algorithms,

item.title: Systems/Software Engineer
item.description:
• Developed critical sub-modules ensuring data partitioning, replication, and system recovery for Nimble Storage.

• Focused on the development of scalable distributed storage systems and possessing in-depth knowledge of I/O path for both object and block storage.

• Streamlined functionality testing process by creating a gRPC-based interface for issuing calls on Kubernetes containers.

item.title: Software Development Intern
item.description: Drove a 40% increase in user engagement by developing a cross-platform Flutter mobile app with RESTful API integration and 3D Unity model visualization for interior design products.
